# MongoDB
MONGO_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/bakimla

# JWT Secret
JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key_here

# Server Port
PORT=3001

# AWS S3 Configuration
AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=your_aws_access_key_id
AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=your_aws_secret_access_key
AWS_REGION=eu-west-1
AWS_S3_BUCKET=your_bucket_name

# AWS CloudFront (Optional - if using CloudFront CDN)
# AWS_CLOUDFRONT_URL=https://d1234567890.cloudfront.net

# OR Direct S3 URL (Optional - will be auto-generated if not provided)
# AWS_S3_BASE_URL=https://your_bucket_name.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com

# NetGSM (SMS Service)
NETGSM_USERNAME=your_netgsm_username
NETGSM_PASSWORD=your_netgsm_password
NETGSM_HEADER=your_netgsm_header

# Iyzico (Payment Gateway)
IYZICO_API_KEY=your_iyzico_api_key
IYZICO_SECRET_KEY=your_iyzico_secret_key
IYZICO_BASE_URL=https://sandbox-api.iyzipay.com

# Parasut (Accounting API)
PARASUT_CLIENT_ID=your_parasut_client_id
PARASUT_CLIENT_SECRET=your_parasut_client_secret
PARASUT_USERNAME=your_parasut_username
PARASUT_PASSWORD=your_parasut_password
PARASUT_COMPANY_ID=your_parasut_company_id

# Environment
NODE_ENV=development
